ca.mcgill.ecse321.scorekeeper.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse321.scorekeeper.model.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Goalie

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Domain object that stores data relating to players. Each Player has multiple Shots an Infractions. Each Player also belongs to a Team and a League. This object is also able to calculate statistics about the players in the team (e.g. their total number of successful goals). Note that a Goalie is also a kind of Player.
    See Also:
    Team, Shot, Infraction, Goalie, League
